input
#| standalone: true
from shiny import reactive
from shiny.express import input, render, ui

ui.column(
    4,
    "Foundation Dimensions",
    ui.input_numeric("n1", label="n", value=1000, min=1),
    ui.input_numeric("mean1", label="µ", value=0, step=0.1),
    ui.input_numeric("sd1", label="σ", value=0.5, min=0.1, step=0.1),
    ui.input_numeric("D", label="Diameter", value = 8, min = 0)
),
        

@render.text
def txt1():
    return f'Input is: "{D}"'



@reactive.Calc
def x_times_2():
    val = input.x() * 2
    print(f"Running x_times_2(). Result is {D}.")
    return val
